title: Summon Small Mammal
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Summon small mammal.png](/images/4/41/Summon_small_mammal.png)](/File:Summon_small_mammal.png) Summon Small Mammal |                                                                                                                   |
| :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                                                                 | 1                                                                                                                 |
| School1                                                                                                               | [Summoning](/Summonings "Summonings")                                                                             |
| Source(s)                                                                                                             | [Book of Callings](/Book_of_Callings "Book of Callings") [Book of Cantrips](/Book_of_Cantrips "Book of Cantrips") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                           | 1                                                                                                                 |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                                                                             | 0                                                                                                                 |
| Power Cap                                                                                                             | 25                                                                                                                |

|   |                                                                                                            |
| - | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Summons a rat, bat, or quokka to the caster's aid. Spell power increases the chance of summoning a quokka. |

**Summon Small Mammal** is a [Summonings](/Summonings "Summonings") spell which summons one weak monster.

[Summoners](/Summoner "Summoner") start with this spell memorized.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [4 History](#History)
- [5 References](#References)

## Useful Info

One small mammal is summoned. Possible summons include:

- - r [![Rat.png](/images/8/8b/Rat.png)](/File:Rat.png) **[Rat](/Rat "Rat")** - Low damage and fragile, but better than nothing.
  - b [![Bat.png](/images/a/ad/Bat.png)](/File:Bat.png) **[Bat](/Bat "Bat")** - Extremely fast and evasive, but does virtually no damage.
  - r [![Quokka.png](/images/f/f6/Quokka.png)](/File:Quokka.png) **[Quokka](/Quokka "Quokka")** - Decent damage and HP. Good all-round early on.

Higher [spell power](/Spell_power "Spell power") can result in a stronger mammal. There is a `1 - 10 / <power>` chance of a quokka. If a quokka was not summoned, there is an equal chance for either a rat or a bat.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

Duration of the summon is around 27 turns; it does not depend on spell power.

There is a summon cap of 2; additional summons will cause the oldest to very quickly time out.

## Strategy

Summon Small Mammal is a level 1 spell; it can kill most things on the early Dungeon floors. But, as it creates [summons](/Summon "Summon"), it can remain useful for a while longer:

- By swapping places with a summon, you create a space, avoiding [attacks of opportunity](/Attacks_of_opportunity "Attacks of opportunity") in the process. This can let you [pillar dance](/Pillar_dance "Pillar dance") any 10-speed melee enemy.
- Even if you have no serious plans to summon things, this spell can be *very* effective when combined with a [scroll of immolation](/Scroll_of_immolation "Scroll of immolation") (or the [Inner Flame](/Inner_Flame "Inner Flame") spell). When an ignited small mammal dies, it'll create a big (3x3) explosion, enough to take out all sorts of threats throughout Dungeon & [Lair](/Lair "Lair").

## Monster Version

A single cast will summon 1 to 3 creatures, with duration of around 81 turns. Each summoned creature has 33% chance of being a bat, otherwise it will be either a rat, a quokka, or a [river rat](/River_rat "River rat") with equal chances.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

The following enemies cast Summon Small Mammal:

- @ [![Eustachio.png](/images/9/9e/Eustachio.png)](/File:Eustachio.png) **[Eustachio](/Eustachio "Eustachio")**
- w [![Gastronok.png](/images/6/63/Gastronok.png)](/File:Gastronok.png) **[Gastronok](/Gastronok "Gastronok")**

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), this spell had a summon cap of 4.
- Prior to [0.14](/0.14 "0.14"), this spell could also summon [grey rats](/Grey_rat "Grey rat"), and had a summon cap of three.
- Prior to [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), this spell could summon multiple creatures, and was known as 'Summon Small Mammals'.
- Prior to [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), a more powerful version of the spell known as [Vampire Summon](/Vampire_Summon "Vampire Summon") was used by [vampires](/Vampire_\(monster\) "Vampire (monster)"), [vampire knights](/Vampire_knight "Vampire knight"), and [deep elf summoners](/Deep_elf_summoner "Deep elf summoner"). It summoned 3-5 mammals (with [orange rats](/Orange_rat "Orange rat") in place of quokkas).
- In [0.6](/0.6 "0.6"), it was [nerfed](/Nerf "Nerf") again, limiting the effect to at most two summoned creatures, and [green rats](/Green_rat "Green rat") and [orange rats](/Orange_rat "Orange rat") were removed from the spell's possible results.
- Prior to to [0.4.3](/0.4.3 "0.4.3"), this spell was affectionately called 'Spammals' for its easy ability to flood your surroundings with allied monsters. The spell was nerfed somewhat for balance reasons.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [spl-summoning.cc:106](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.1/crawl-ref/source/spl-summoning.cc#L106) (0.30.1)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [mon-cast.cc:5798](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.30.1/crawl-ref/source/mon-cast.cc#L5798) (0.30.1)
html:
Summon Small Mammal

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Summon Small Mammal
Level 1
School1 Summoning
Source(s) Book of Callings
Book of Cantrips
Casting noise 1
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 25
Summons a rat, bat, or quokka to the caster's aid. Spell power increases the chance of summoning a quokka.

Summon Small Mammal is a Summonings spell which summons one weak monster.

Summoners start with this spell memorized.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 Monster Version
  • 4 History
  • 5 References

Useful Info

One small mammal is summoned. Possible summons include:

r Rat - Low damage and fragile, but better than nothing.
b Bat - Extremely fast and evasive, but does virtually no damage.
r Quokka - Decent damage and HP. Good all-round early on.

Higher spell power can result in a stronger mammal. There is a 1 - 10 / <power> chance of a quokka. If a quokka was not summoned, there is an equal chance for either a rat or a bat.[1]

Duration of the summon is around 27 turns; it does not depend on spell power.

There is a summon cap of 2; additional summons will cause the oldest to very quickly time out.

Strategy

Summon Small Mammal is a level 1 spell; it can kill most things on the early Dungeon floors. But, as it creates summons, it can remain useful for a while longer:

  • By swapping places with a summon, you create a space, avoiding attacks of opportunity in the process. This can let you pillar dance any 10-speed melee enemy.
  • Even if you have no serious plans to summon things, this spell can be very effective when combined with a scroll of immolation (or the Inner Flame spell). When an ignited small mammal dies, it'll create a big (3x3) explosion, enough to take out all sorts of threats throughout Dungeon & Lair.

Monster Version

A single cast will summon 1 to 3 creatures, with duration of around 81 turns. Each summoned creature has 33% chance of being a bat, otherwise it will be either a rat, a quokka, or a river rat with equal chances.[2]

The following enemies cast Summon Small Mammal:

  • @ Eustachio
  • w Gastronok

History

  • Prior to 0.28, this spell had a summon cap of 4.
  • Prior to 0.14, this spell could also summon grey rats, and had a summon cap of three.
  • Prior to 0.13, this spell could summon multiple creatures, and was known as 'Summon Small Mammals'.
  • Prior to 0.12, a more powerful version of the spell known as Vampire Summon was used by vampires, vampire knights, and deep elf summoners. It summoned 3-5 mammals (with orange rats in place of quokkas).
  • In 0.6, it was nerfed again, limiting the effect to at most two summoned creatures, and green rats and orange rats were removed from the spell's possible results.
  • Prior to to 0.4.3, this spell was affectionately called 'Spammals' for its easy ability to flood your surroundings with allied monsters. The spell was nerfed somewhat for balance reasons.

References

  1. ↑ spl-summoning.cc:106 (0.30.1)
  2. ↑ mon-cast.cc:5798 (0.30.1)
